Posts.Content: worried247 wrote: I've had a pimple from sweat i guess on my right breast and it finally popped one day, i remember showing it to a doctor and they didnt think much of it. However, it had been almost a year and here i am with this pink mark on my right breast. It doesnt really hurt, its just there?? Not sure how to make it go away but it looks like a small light bruise with a peeled pink spot in the middle, both flat . Really strange to me. Currently i don't have the money for an appointment, i will though if I know its serious. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Breast pimple mark has been here for almost a year? worried247 MelissaDallas
